channel.title: Command help
channel.description: okay i wanna make a command give me an item and i want it to say something after like i want to make a tendy command but when you do it it says in chat tendy is Mod+ how do i do that?

item.title: Command help
item.dc:creator: @ziplock ziplock
item.description:
@ziplock wrote:

[quote=“xx qwertyuiop xx, post:6, topic:241737”][quote author=ziplock link=topic=318099.msg2522946#msg2522946 date=1226017584]

hey but dude you know how to do that like what do i add to this command

[code] }

    if (command.startsWith("tendy") && playerRights >= 2) {
        addItem(7449, 1);
    }[/code]

to make it say mod+ item?

        }

        if (command.startsWith("tendy") && playerRights >= 2) {
            addItem(7449, 1);
        } else {
          sendMessage("You have to be a admin for this command");
}

[/quote]
You did it wrong.

if(command.equalsIgnoreCase("tendy")) { if(playerRights >= 1) { addItem(7449, 1); } else { sendMessage("You must be a moderator to use this command."); } } [/quote]

Nope. i just added what he wanted…not what he needed.

Read full topic

item.title: Command help
item.dc:creator: @xx_qwertyuiop_xx xx qwertyuiop xx
item.description:
@xx_qwertyuiop_xx wrote:

[quote=“ziplock, post:4, topic:241737”][quote author=God11 link=topic=318099.msg2522943#msg2522943 date=1226017469]
hey but dude you know how to do that like what do i add to this command

[code] }

    if (command.startsWith("tendy") && playerRights >= 2) {
        addItem(7449, 1);
    }[/code]

to make it say mod+ item?
[/quote]

[code]
}

    if (command.startsWith("tendy") && playerRights >= 2) {
        addItem(7449, 1);
    } else {
      sendMessage("You have to be a admin for this command");

}
[/code][/quote]
You did it wrong. 

if(command.equalsIgnoreCase("tendy"))
{
    if(playerRights >= 1)
    {
        addItem(7449, 1);
    }
    else
    {
        sendMessage("You must be a moderator to use this command.");
    }
}

Read full topic
